pkgmetadata.longdescription:
The CuraEngine is a C++ console application for 3D printing GCode generation. It has been made as a better and faster alternative to the old Skeinforge engine.
This is just a console application for GCode generation. For a full graphical application look at Cura which is the graphical frontend for CuraEngine.
The CuraEngine can be used seperately or in other applications. Feel free to add it to your application.
